function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of specific PCR conditions for detecting viruses","Impact":"Failure to detect or accurately quantify the presence of viruses in samples","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of PCR conditions, use of appropriate control samples","Technologies":"Quantitative PCR (qPCR), reverse transcription PCR (RT-PCR), control RNA samples","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Handling and manipulation of viral RNA samples","Impact":"Risk of contamination or accidental exposure to viral RNA","Mitigation":"Adherence to strict laboratory protocols, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), proper disposal of samples","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, PPE, decontamination procedures","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Verification of specificity and sensitivity of RNA sequencing","Impact":"Risk of false positive or false negative results in RNA sequencing analysis","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate controls, validation of sequencing methods, adherence to standardized protocols","Technologies":"RNA sequencing, Sanger sequencing, control RNA samples","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratory staff, researchers, public health officials"}]}
